content.rendered:
HOLIDAY BEAUTY + LUXURY GIFTS

Don’t forget to give the gift of beauty this holiday season. D’Lashes beauty products make perfect gifts for those you love. We also offer lash extensions gift certificates! Give them a gift of a relaxing spa experience with stunning lash extensions.

Red on red look is from FWRD.COM. Top green bag is CHLOE and the bottom bag is the top-selling Gucci bag. The best selling A-List Lashes are from the one and only D’Lashes.com/shop. I also love all the Estee Lauder beauty sets that come in a beautiful holiday box. All their face creams are to die for! Need stocking stuffers? D’Lashes has beautiful candles, lashes, lipsticks, and lash cleansing wash. Click on the bottom link to shop.

Wishing you all a very warm holiday season. May this be a time spent with family and friends enjoying all the festivities. Stay tuned for another holiday post tomorrow!

P.S. Did you book your lash extensions appointment yet? Book those lash extensions appointments early during the busy holiday season! For appointments – Click Here (By Appointment Only). Shop D’Lashes Beauty and A-List Strip Lashes Here. 

XO XO, DIONNE
